summary: This mod includes 17 new skill books, 3 new spells, and one mage robe/outfit with jewelry. This pack is the first of three for the Mage skill tree. This mod has leveled list integration.
descriptionHtml:
This mod includes 17 new skill books, 3 new spells, and one mage robe/outfit with jewelry. This pack is the first of three for the Mage skill tree. This mod has leveled list integration. I also plan to add 3 packs for both the warrior and thief skill trees. This mod is in the BETA stages so you may encounter bugs, even though I have tested it extensively, crap happens. The mod should not interfere with other mods, and you only need the Skyrim.esm file.

With the Skill books they change the maximum of 5 to 8 books for magic skills; and from 5 to 6 books for Alchemy and enchanting skills.

The spells include Wielder of Force, Wielder of Beast, and Wielder of Time.

You can but the spells, spell books, and outfit from Farengar.

If you like it, endorse it. Scheduled Release date for Mages Pack II is February 15th 2014
author: justinsomethan
